headline: Out of Tune But Right On Time
description: A hand-drawn visual composition exploring dissonance, timing, and expressive rhythm through text, figure, and color play.

fieldDefinitions.resonantThread: Misalignment is not failure when aligned with inner rhythm.
fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: This work foregrounds how perceived errors or dissonance can still achieve harmony within a personal or expressive timeline, challenging normative standards of 'correctness' in creative output.

motifMap.meaning: Represents the concept of being out of tune or off-key
Stylized performer embodying confidence despite dissonance

motifMap.position: Center, across the phrase 'BUT RIGHT ON'

motifMap.meaning: Anchors the piece thematically; the final word reinforces structure
Creates contrast and stage-like framing for spotlighted elements

fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: "out of tune BUT right ON TIME"
sourceFragments: Handwriting variations indicating layered authorship or tonal shifts
Possible reference to musical or performative themes

associatedMedia.description: Hand-drawn art featuring the phrase 'out of tune BUT right ON TIME' with a stylized figure and musical notes
